762970.name: PAKO 2 - Official Soundtrack
762970.description:
PAKO 2 - Official Soundtrack is a pumping mix of different electronic stylings, made by Finnish musician DKSTR. Songs have been remixed and rearranged to full song length. DLC contains 12 songs in 320kbs mp3 file format and the cover art in high resolution.
Songs will be downloaded into your game folder. E.g. "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\PAKO2\PAKO 2 - Official Soundtrack DLC"

If the soundtrack doesn't update automatically also in your Steam Client music library, you can try to refresh the music library listing: Steam > Settings > Music > Scan Now

Tracklist

1. Don't Stop 02:36

2. Riley 03:16

3. Whale 02:48

4. Toms Booze Shack 03:14

5. Isoville 02:50

6. Beat 02:09

7. Wanderer 03:03

8. Honest Hanks (intermission) 01:04

9. Freak Bus 05:28

10. Devils Plains 04:00

11. Devils Plains Pt. II 03:36

12. Theme From Pako 2 02:03
762970.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
